attributes.action: End the use of global terrorism as a bare faced lie to drive military action against innocent countries while destroying our freedom and democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the UK Government is to be believed, we must surrender our freedom and rights and wage war against countries who posess natural resources which the UK and US want exclusive control of. This is all in the name of a faceless War on Terror! All the while our country falls apart from the inside out. Please help to try and stop the obscene military spending and return our rights. We do not subscribe to the Governments agendas and we will not take it lying down.

rejection.details: Please reword your title so it is clear what you are requesting the government do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
